entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS, SNOW SHOWERS AND FREEZING RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 30

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
